data.text: @cldilts Hi again Caren - just following up to let you know the site is up and running! Our Black Friday Sale runs until this coming Tuesday night. We apologize again and thank you for your patience!
@cldilts Hi Caren! So sorry about this - we're working hard to get this fixed, and we appreciate your patience. <3 We'll send out an update once we're back up and running!
